Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Wheel brake assembly seizure. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Wear beyond serviceable limits due to extended operational hours
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Physical
examination revealed signs of wear and degradation.
c) Remedial Measures Replace defective component with serviceable unit from approved stock
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Modify design to incorporate additional safety margin
d) Attributable Code: U - Lapses on the part of User
Remarks: Thorough investigation completed. Preventive actions recommended.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design assessment confirms component operated within specified limits. Recommend enhanced inspection protocol.
Date: 12/08/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
